Biography


Hi, I'm Jeff. I go by Jeff, Jeffrey, Jeffy, or whatever other variations one may conjur.

I graduated in May 2015 from the University of Idaho with degrees in mathematics and psychology as well as minors in computer science and statistics.

I am currently living in Kleve, Germany, where I am taking classes in Bioengineering.

Previously, I worked as an Associate Data Scientist at Vacasa.

In my freetime I enjoy reading, PC gaming, and a variety of outdoor activities (especially rock climbing). My favorite computer games include Portal and the Half-Life series, and I thoroughly enjoy a good puzzle game.

If you would like to know more about me, you can contact me at jeff@jeffreysolo.com

Best,
Jeff Solomon
